featured.text: Most people would think that aside from comets and stars there is little else out there.
All the obstacles of reality can be set aside and you are able to accomplish tasks that you could never manage in waking reality.

definition.zh_def: 在一旁，偏離主要方向或主題。
definition.en_def: To one side; out of the way; not in the main focus.
definition.example: She set her books aside to help her friend.
